EmailTemplate.name: ASI CRM VN POSM Request Completed Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: POSM Request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} has been completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.OwnerFullName},
Your POSM Request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} has been completed.
Please click this link {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Link} to view the POSM Request details.
